Tavatron transformed and climbed down the cliff wall. She dropped the last 
few feet and landed with a soft thud on the valley floor.

*By the cover of night the best battles are faught.* Tavatron thought to 
herself as she took one last look at Dinobot, mentally marking his position 
in relevance to her own, and disappeared into the surrounding trees.

>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Fri, 14 Apr 2000 14:31:45 PDT
>
>* Dinobot came up behind Tavatron and looked down into the valley, it 
>wasn't
>small but it wasn't overly big either.
>There were enough shrubs and bushes to create cover if needed and enough
>rough terrain to put a well practiced battle to the challenge.
>He nodded.*
>
>" You have chosen well."
>
>* Dinobot looked back over his shoulder to make sure that nobot was
>following them then motioned Tavatron to take the lead. He kept a watchful
>optic, he hoped for a real fight but a practice battle was good enough for
>now. Besides, he wanted to test Tavatron's power and battle knowledge.
>It was almost midnight but they could both see well in the dark, the moon
>shawn it's reflection in a small pond at the bottom of the valley. Yet
>another challenge.
>Dinobot hade to admit though, Tavatron had a good optic for terrain that
>challenged her abilities of a warrior.*
>
